import React, {useContext} from 'react' import {SampleData} from './SampleData' import {Link, Switch, Route} from 'react-router-dom' const SearchResult = (item) => { return (

{item.title}

{item.subtitle} Condition

{/*

Item Price:

*/}

${(item.price).split(".")[1].length < 2 ? (item.price.concat("0")) : item.price }

+ Free Shipping

Buy It Now

{/*

Quantity:

3

Ends Tuesday

Seller:

Destroyer

100% positive Feedback

*/}
) } const ImageContainer = { backgroundColor:'white', display: 'block', width:'13rem', height:'5rem', marginLeft:'23%', // borderWidth:'thin', // borderColor:'black', // borderStyle:'solid', height:'5%', boxShadow: '0 4px 8px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 6px 20px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.19)' } const ImageStyle = { display: 'flex', resizeMode: 'contain', resizeImage: 'contain', marginRight: 'auto', marginLeft:'auto', maxWidth: '100%', // width:'auto', maxHeight: '100%', backgroundColor:'white' } export default SearchResult
